Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders ( technically an Independent, though he generally sides with Democrats) said Ryan's Roadmap would slash Social Security benefits and provide tax breaks for the wealthy, while raising taxes on just about everyone else. The fact of the matter is, Social Security has not contributed one nickel to our deficit or our national debt, and it must be protected, Sen. Bernie Sanders added. Eric Schmidt , who was made Google Inc. CEO in 2001 to provide greater management experience at the youthful company, explained that the decision had been taken to`` simplify our management structure and speed up decision making''. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, he said.`` In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.'' to sell more than a half million company shares throughout the year as part of his asset-diversification plan, his first such sale in more than three years,'' Steve Jobs Russolillo reports for Dow Jones Newswires. The sales, worth about$ 335 million based on Google Inc. 's closing price Thursday, will lower Eric Schmidt 's stake and voting power, and comes as Google Inc. announced that co-founder Larry Page will replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive. Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman in April, Russolillo reports.`` The stock-trading plan, unveiled in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, said Eric Schmidt intends to sell as much as 534,000 Class A shares during the course of the year.
